FragilityCurve.Name: Wall Partition, Type: High End Marble or Wood Panel, Full Height, Fixed Below, Slip Track Above w/ returns (friction connection)
FragilityCurve.Author: Not Given
FragilityCurve.Notes: None Import errors: Warning, Data missing: C3011.003c:DS2:Time: Could not parse CurveType - Assuming Normal Warning, Data missing: C3011.003c:DS2:Time: Could not parse Upper Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: C3011.003c:DS2:Time: Could not parse Lower Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: C3011.003c:DS2:Time: Could not parse Dispersion - Assuming 0.5 Warning, Data missing: C3011.003c:DS2:Cost: Could not parse CurveType - Assuming Normal Warning, Data missing: C3011.003c:DS2:Cost: Could not parse Upper Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: C3011.003c:DS2:Cost: Could not parse Lower Quantity cost - Assuming 0 Warning, Data missing: C3011.003c:DS2:Cost: Could not parse Dispersion - Assuming 0.5 Warning: C3011.003c: C3011.003c: DS1 overlaps DS2 at 0.02 - Make sure damage states are minimally overlapping

DamageState.Description: minor cracked joints and minor cracks in marble / wood paneling.

ConsequenceGroup.RepairMeasures: Carefully remove cracked marble/paneling and grout at cracked joints, and install new marble/paneling and re-grout joints for 10% of full 100 foot length of wall. Existing wall board will remain place.

DamageState.Description: significant cracks in marble / wood paneling.

ConsequenceGroup.RepairMeasures: Install new marble/paneling for full 100 foot length of wall. Note: the gypsum wall board will also be removed and replaced which means the removal of the marble/paneling will be part of the gypsum wall board removal.
